By unifying these two world-class teams of experts, we empower ourselves to expand our reach from Asia, Australia, the Americas to Europe with a bigger portfolio of products and services. To celebrate this new chapter of exciting business opportunities and success, Neon Orient has unveiled an upgraded logo.

wpPost.title: Welcoming Neon Orient to join FLS Group

seo.title: Welcoming Neon Orient to join FLS Group - FLS
seo.metaDesc: As part of our ambitious plan to leverage our trading service, FLS Trading is entering a merger with Neon Orient, a leading provider of stationery and consumer goods in Asia.
seo.opengraphTitle: Welcoming Neon Orient to join FLS Group - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: As part of our ambitious plan to leverage our trading service, FLS Trading is entering a merger with Neon Orient, a leading provider of stationery and consumer goods in Asia.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent:
We proudly kick-start 2023 with the merger of FLS Trading and Neon Orient, a leading provider of school & office stationery supplies and consumer goods with 20 years' expertise.
 
By unifying these two world-class teams of experts, we empower ourselves to expand our reach from Asia, Australia, the Americas to Europe with a bigger portfolio of products and services. To celebrate this new chapter of exciting business opportunities and success, Neon Orient has unveiled an upgraded logo.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: With Neon Orient joining our Group, we are looking forward to taking your global trading business to new heights.
